languages.text: "На нижних палубах неспокойно, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители активно ищут бунтовщиков и еретиков, но население крайне недовольно жесткими методами. Многие проклинают имя Абеляра, подпись которого стоит под приказами и чьим именем совершаются притеснения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис достает из глубоких рукавов инфопластину и вводит пароль. На темном экране загораются зеленые символы.{/n} "На нижних палубах неспокойно, Лорд-капитан. Служба охраны активно ищет бунтовщиков и еретиков, но население крайне недовольно жесткими методами".

languages.text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."
languages.original_text: "На нижних палубах неспокойно, Лорд-капитан. Блюстители активно ищут бунтовщиков и еретиков, но население крайне недовольно жесткими методами. Многие проклинают имя Абеляра, подпись которого стоит под приказами и чьим именем совершаются притеснения".

traits.locale_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The guards are actively looking for rabble rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely unhappy with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

"There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The guards are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely unhappy with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

"There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The guards are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely unhappy with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

"There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

languages.text: «Las cubiertas inferiores están descontentas, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Sus agentes buscan activamente a los agitadores y a herejes, pero la población está extremadamente insatisfecha por la dureza del trato recibido. Muchos maldicen a Abelard, cuya firma está plasmada en las órdenes y en cuyo nombre se comete esta opresión».
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: «Las cubiertas inferiores están descontentas, L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Sus agentes buscan activamente a los agitadores y a herejes, pero la población está extremadamente insatisfecha por la dureza del trato recibido. Muchos maldicen a Abelard, cuya firma está plasmada en las órdenes y en cuyo nombre se comete esta opresión».

languages.text: “下层甲板发生了动乱，舰长大人。目前执法者正在搜查寻衅滋事的民众与异端分子，但民众对这种严厉的待遇非常不满。很多人都在咒骂阿贝拉德，因为所有的命令都是由他签署的，而且所有的镇压都是以他的名义进行的。”
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: “下层甲板发生了动乱，舰长大人。目前镇压者正在搜查寻衅滋事的民众与异端分子，但民众对这种严厉的待遇非常不满。很多人都在咒骂阿贝拉德，因为所有的命令都是由他签署的，而且所有的镇压都是以他的名义进行的。”

languages.text: 「下層デッキで暴動が起きています、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサー達が民衆を煽る者や異端者を積極的に探しており、その手荒い扱いに民の不満が爆発しそうです。アベラルドは多くの者から恨みを買っています。彼の署名で命令が下り、彼の名のもとに弾圧が行われているのですから」
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: 「下層デッキで暴動が起きています、ロード・キャプテン。エンフォーサー達が民衆を煽る者や異端者を積極的に探しており、その手荒い扱いに民の不満が爆発しそうです。アベラルドは多くの者から恨みを買っています。彼の署名で命令が下り、彼の名のもとに弾圧が行われているのですから」

languages.text: "Auf den unteren Decks herrscht Unruhe, Lord Captain. Die Enforcers suchen aktiv nach Aufwieglern und Ketzern, aber die Population ist extrem unzufrieden mit der strengen Behandlung. Viele verfluchen Abelard, der die Befehle unterschrieben hat und in dessen Namen die Unterdrückung erfolgt."
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: "Auf den unteren Decks herrscht Unruhe, Lord Captain. Die Enforcers suchen aktiv nach Aufwieglern und Ketzern, aber die Population ist extrem unzufrieden mit der strengen Behandlung. Viele verfluchen Abelard, der die Befehle unterschrieben hat und in dessen Namen die Unterdrückung erfolgt."

languages.text: « L'agitation règne sur les ponts inférieurs, où les gens sont extrêmement mécontents du traitement sévère subi aux mains des prévôts à la recherche de fauteurs de troubles et d'hérétiques. Beaucoup maudissent Abélard, qui a signé les ordres ayant donné lieu à ces mesures oppressives. »
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: « L'agitation règne sur les ponts inférieurs, où les gens sont extrêmement mécontents du traitement sévère subi aux mains des prévôts à la recherche de fauteurs de troubles et d'hérétiques. Beaucoup maudissent Abélard, qui a signé les ordres ayant donné lieu à ces mesures oppressives. »

languages.text: "Aşağı güvertelerde huzursuzluk var Lord Kaptan. Güvenlik güçleri, ayaktakımını galeyana getirenleri ve kâfirleri arıyor. İnsanlarsa sert muameleden son derece şikâyetçi. Birçokları; emirlerde imzası bulunan, baskının gerçekleştirilme sebebi olarak gördükleri Abelard'a hakaretler yağdırıyor."
languages.original_text: "There is unrest on the lower decks, Lord Captain. The enforcers are actively looking for rabble-rousers and heretics, but the population is extremely dissatisfied with the harsh treatment. Many are cursing Abelard, whose signature marks the orders and in whose name the oppression is being committed."

traits.locale_text: "Aşağı güvertelerde huzursuzluk var Lord Kaptan. Güvenlik güçleri sürekli olarak ayaktakımını galeyana getirenlerin ve kâfirlerin arayışında ancak insanlar sert muameleden son derece şikâyetçi. Birçokları emirlerde imzası bulunan, baskının gerçekleştirilme sebebi olarak gördükleri Abelard'a hakaretler yağdırıyor."
